extensionDescription.message: A browser extension to improve your writing experience on LinkedIn

noAuthenticated.message: You are not connected to your PerfectPost account. Please log in to use the extension.

list_createaccount.message: Tired of your LinkedIn feed? Create a PerfectPost account to manage multiple lists and see only the contacts that interest you.

listshortcut_nonelistcreated.message: Tired of your LinkedIn feed? Store your favorite contacts here to never miss their updates.

managelistdescription.message: To add a person to the list, visit their profile and click on "Add to my list" or use the search function below.

managelistsearch.message: Search for a member or page on LinkedIn

managelistmaxmember.message: You have reached the limit of people / organizations in this list.

managelist_reachedratelimite.message: You have reached the limit of 1 list for free accounts

listeselectempty_description.message: You'll need to create a List before adding anyone.

tipsaction_noaccount.message: Find daily tips to improve your LinkedIn experience by creating a PerfectPost account.

tipsaction_account_mismatch.message: Your PerfectPost account is associated with another LinkedIn account.

accrocheview_title.message: The hook is the first part of your text, the one that must catch the reader's attention. It must be two lines maximum and make you want to read more, even to a person who does not know you and who discovers you. For that here are some structures that have proven themselves.

accrocheview_error.message: An error occurred while loading the hooks. Please try again later.

assistantview_trial_info.message: You are in a free trial period until $DATE$. Enjoy all the premium features!

linkedin_token_invalid_message.message: The connection between LinkedIn and PerfectPost has expired. Please reconnect your account to continue using PerfectPost.
linkedin_token_invalid_message.description: Message affich√© lorsque les tokens LinkedIn sont invalides.

linkedin_token_invalid_link.description: Texte du lien qui redirige vers les param√®tres pour r√©g√©n√©rer les tokens.

pptab_title.message: This tab is managed by PerfectPost, please do not touch it.

removemodal_couldsavepublication.message: Think about connecting with PerfectPost and your next publications will be automatically saved.

removemodal_alreadysavespublication.message: Do not panic ! The content of your publication has already been automatically saved on PerfectPost

loginview_message.message: You must use your PerfectPost credentials to log in.

changepasswordview_message.message: You are connected with a temporary password, please choose your final password.

activityaction_createaccount.message: Create an account to save your goals

commentview_helpertext.message: This comment will be published right after your post.

commentview_needpremium.message: You need a premium account to post a comment.

ctaview_description.message: Often, the post ends with a ‚Äúcall-to-action‚Äù: the reader is called upon to take an action (click, like, comment, subscribe, etc.). We have written ready-made endings to entice people to subscribe after they finish reading the post. Use them or save your own to save time!

ctaview_premium.message:
Switch to PerfectPost premium to access dozens of hook ideas.
We add new ones every month.
You never run out of inspiration again!

copywriting_adverb.message: It's okay to limit adverbs to cut to the chase üòâ

copywriting_dear_network.message: Ah no no no. We don't say "Dear network" on Linkedin anymore, huh! We have to find a hook that makes you want to read more!

copywriting_default.message: I don't know what to tell you, but it seems suspicious.

copywriting_dots.message: The "..." make the text soft. In 90% of cases, it works better removing them üòâ

copywriting_hashtag.message: Hashtags on Linkedin, it goes at the end, not in the text! Finally after you do as you want.

copywriting_hashtag_headline.message: No no, it's at the bottom of the hashtags. We always start with a teaser here!

copywriting_hello.message: We haven't started a message with Hello on social media since 1903. It's kind of like "Dear network".

copywriting_more_than_30_word.message: That's a very (too) long sentence: There's surely a way to shorten it üëå

copywriting_no_end_of_line_colon.message: Isn't it clearer if we skip a line after the colon?

copywriting_parenthesis.message: Are you sure we can't remove what's in parentheses?

copywriting_too_much_emoji.message: Hep hep hep, emoji font. Too many there. Do you have permission for that?

copywriting_too_much_line.message: Air it out with line breaks! üòâ

copywriting_too_much_line_headline.message: Wow, this hook is dense. Can't we get it to breathe a little?

copywriting_url.message: Links are often towards the end üòâ (and without the preview)

copywriting_premium_hidden.message:
We found $COUNT$ additional writing issues
in this text available only for Premium users.

copywriting_premium_hidden_safari.message:
We found $COUNT$ additional writing issues
in this text available only for Premium users.

sharemodalprocessor_scheduled_disabled.message: With linkedin you can't schedule this type of post but you can do it with PerfectPost !

sharemodalprocessor_welcome_message.message:
Tadaaaaa ! ‚ú®

Here is the new version of PerfectPost prepared with ‚ù§Ô∏è


All the features of the old version are there:

bold/italic, see more, drafts, scheduling etc.


And new ones are coming üôÇ


We made a quick tutorial here:

https://www.perfectpost.fr/onboarding-en


We hope you'll like it!

Antoine and Jerome from PerfectPost


PS: To start

1Ô∏è‚É£ log in with your PerfectPost credentials üëâ

2Ô∏è‚É£ edit this message to save it in your drafts

account_login.message: Log in to my PerfectPost account

accountmismatchview_maintitle.message: Your PerfectPost account is associated with another LinkedIn account

accountmismatchview_description.message:
You are currently connected with the account $PROFILE1$.
However, your PerfectPost account is associated with the profile $PROFILE2$.
To avoid mixing data between the two accounts, we have disabled the extension for the moment.

To correct this association, you can do it in the settings of your PerfectPost account or you can connect to another PerfectPost account by clicking on the buttons below.

accountmismatchview_ppemail.message: You are connected to your PerfectPost account with the email: $EMAIL$

tipsaction_account_not_associated.message: Your PerfectPost account is not associated with your LinkedIn account.

accountnotassociatedview_description.message: To associate your PerfectPost account with your LinkedIn account, please log in to your PerfectPost account and click on the "Associate my LinkedIn account" button.

missingaccountassociation_maintitle.message: Your PerfectPost account is not yet associated with your LinkedIn account

missingaccountassociation_description.message: You are connected to your PerfectPost account but it is not yet ready to be used on LinkedIn. To associate your LinkedIn account with your PerfectPost account, please click on the button below.
